title: [1.7.10]Parzi's Star Wars Mod—— 帕尔齐的星球大战mod
txt_content:
本帖最后由 164303386 于 2018-3-26 19:41 编辑 

简介：（作者原文）
Explore the Galaxy with Parzi’s Star Wars Mod!  Parzi's Star Wars Mod is an attempt to recreate a playable experience of the Star Wars saga, while still remaining as canon* as possible! We strive to be different from any experience you have ever seen before by creating completely playable Star Wars aspects taken directly from the saga. Among other things, Parzi's Star Wars Mod adds various new gameplay features and mechanics, including:  20+ Blasters (Pistols, Rifles and Heavy Rifles) 3 Lightsabers (Blue, Green and Red, yes, we have Kylo Ren's) 4 Melee weapons 13 Mobs, many ridable and a few milkable, and most drop special loot! 11 Sets of armor (Some with special capabilities) 5 Planets to explore, each with their own unique terrain and features (including suns and moons!) 11 Droids to take on adventures! Including the lovable BB-8! Fully pilotable vehicles X-Wing Starfighters A-Wing Interceptors TIE Fighters TIE Interceptors More with every future release!  Diverse Loot and Currency system with merchants Many structures pulled directly from the Star Wars Universe for you to explore, including a FULL MOS EISLEY! More complete locations coming in future updates!个人大概翻译：
parzi的星战mod是试图重现星球大战的一个mod,parzi的星战mod增加了各种新的游戏物品：
20 +枪械（手枪、步枪和重步枪）3把光剑13个怪物11套盔甲（有特殊能力的）5大行星探索，每一个都有自己独特的地形和功能（包括太阳和月亮！）11机器人！包括可爱的bb-8！战机：X翼星际战斗机A翼截击机钛战机TIE截击机
不同的战利品和货币系统与商人完整的？(原贴为pilotable，翻译不出来)载具，有以下：
X翼星际战斗机A翼截击机钛战机TIE截击机
多样的战利品和货币系统与商人许多有结构的星球大战的星球等着你去探索！
视频介绍（需要翻墙）：1、https://youtu.be/yJdIf-TkHZU2、https://youtu.be/R_WYPv_fRRA作者的一些话（英文）：*Canonicity Disclaimer: We have tried to make this mod as canon correct as humanly possible. That being said, some intricate details and features were omitted or reworked to make the mod more playable, or in some cases, plausible in the Minecraft universe. We are just fans of Star Wars and could never possibly know everything about the entire universe and make everything in this mod 100% canon and correct. However, we did make this mod with canonicity in mind, and through long hours of research strongly believe that we have created a good example of a canon Star Wars experience in the Minecraft environment. If we got something really wrong or you have any suggestions, questions, comments, or problems with our mod, please post it as an issue to us on our GitHub. Feel free to make pull requests to fix bugs, but please contact us is you plan to change or add new features. We will get back to you as soon as possible and take everything you say very seriously and appreciate any and all support of our work.更新日志（纯英文）：https://github.com/Parzivail-Mod ... releases/tag/v1.3.3（貌似404了）注意事项:最新版本需要JAVA1.8运行！！！，闪退的请注意JAVA版本。

replies.author: +言午金夕+
replies.txt_content: 光剑不好：有bug，不管你拿的什么颜色的光剑，你攻击一下怪物都会变成蓝色的光剑。而且光剑还不能防御，只是攻击高没什么意思，各种光束枪开枪声音不太对，第一人称枪朝前拿着还不错，可是一开第三人称就是枪口朝着地，特别无语。而且这只是星球大战的一点点东西。很多东西都没有，或许这个mod作者还在更新，但照这样做下去，战斗机直接出模型.....我看够呛能够做出优秀的星战mod......

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: wry20041210
replies.txt_content:
作者的话（中文）
正规的免责声明：我们试图让这个MOD为佳能正确是可能的。也就是说，一些复杂的细节被省略或返工的mod更耐玩，或在某些情况下，可能在Minecraft的宇宙。我们只是星球大战的球迷，也可能永远不可能知道整个宇宙的一切，并使一切在这个国防部100%经典和正确的。然而，我们没有正规的思想使这个MOD，通过长时间的研究强烈地相信，我们已经创造了一个经典星球大战在Minecraft环境体验的一个很好的例子。如果我们得到的东西真的错了或者你有任何建议，意见，问题，或问题与我们的MOD，请将它作为在GitHub上我们给我们一个问题。随时准备拉请求修复的错误，但请与我们联系是你计划改变或添加新的功能。我们会尽快回到你的，并采取一切你说得很认真，并欣赏我们的工作的任何和所有的支持。
